description: Provide electrical service to the Joseph A. Ghiz Building in Summerside, PEI. Perform various electrical tasks such as maintenance, repairs, and emergencies as needed. This is a 2-year agreement with individual call-up amounts up to $40,000.00.

tags: Department of Public Works and Government Services
full_summary:
**ED060-240122A**: RISO - Electrical Services - Joseph A. Ghiz Building, Summerside, Prince Edward Island

**Procurement Number:** WS4102494907
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Publication Date:** September 12, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** September 27, 2023 2:00 PM (EDT)

**Procurement Category:** Construction (CNST)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive, Open Bidding
**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Summary:**
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSC) invites interested providers to submit their bid for a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for Electrical Services at the Joseph A Ghiz Building, located in Summerside, Prince Edward Island. The selected provider will be responsible for providing coordination, administration, and supervision of all labour, material, tools, and equipment necessary to perform electrical maintenance service work, minor repairs, emergency repairs, and other related work as specified in the Statement of Work.

**Key Features:**
- **RISO Term:** Two (2) years on an as-and-when-requested basis
- **Maximum Contract Amount:** $40,000.00 (HSTI)
- **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price (currency)
- **Trade Agreements:** In accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Services Required:**
The contractor will be responsible for managing and performing a range of electrical services, including:

* Coordination, administration, and supervision of labour, materials, tools, and equipment
* Electrical maintenance service work
* Minor repairs
* Emergency repairs
* Other related work specified in the Statement of Work

**Additional Information:**
A Standing Offer is an agreement and not a contract. Canada does not guarantee that the full amount, or any amount, will be called up on any resulting RISO. The term of the Standing Offer is two (2) years.

**Contact Information:**
Gary Bryant (Contractor)
gary.bryant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note that this entry has been reformatted to make it easier to read. The text has been rewritten in a more professional tone, and unnecessary information has been removed. The entry now includes a clear summary of the required services and key features of the RISO. The rewritten entry also includes contact information for the contractor. 

**Specific Deliverables:**
The selected contractor will be required to:

- Provide
